Product Release Notes

Below are recent product updates for January-March 2022
If you would like be sent an email whenever this page changes, please see the Setup Automatic Email on Product Updates document.

Video Cloud

Feature: Dolby Atmos Audio

Product Area: Ingestion

Date: 25-March-2022

Description: Dolby Atmos audio can now be passed through to specific Video Cloud renditions

Go to Documentation

Feature: Notifications for changes to shared video assets for affiliate accounts

Product Area: CMS API

Date: 25-March-2022

Description: New master-video-change event allows affiliate accounts to receive notifications when assets of videos shared to them have been modified

Go to Documentation

Feature: HEVC video with EAC3 or AC3 audio

Product Area: Video

Date: 25-March-2022

Description: EAC3 or AC3 audio is now supported for HEVC in Video Cloud

Go to Documentation

Feature: Native SDK for iOS/tvOS release 6.10.3

Product Area: Native SDK for iOS

Date: 25-March-2022

Description: Native SDK for iOS release 6.10.3

Go to Documentation

Feature: Native SDK for Android release 6.18.2

Product Area: Native SDK for Android

Date: 25-March-2022

Description: Native SDK for iOS release 6.18.2

Go to Documentation

Feature: S3 bucket configuration

Product Area: Cloud Playout

Date: 4-March-2022

Description: Configure one or more AWS S3 buckets to use as a destination for Cloud Playout channels

Go to Documentation

Feature: Live redundancy

Product Area: Cloud Playout

Date: 4-March-2022

Description: Use Live Redundancy using Studio

Go to Documentation

Feature: Channels with Live redundancy

Product Area: Cloud Playout APIs

Date: 4-March-2022

Description: Adding support for Live redundancy and SSAI with Live content

Go to Documentation

Feature: Roku Trick Play support for HLS and DASH

Product Area: Roku

Date: 25-February-2022

Description: Added support for mid-roll ads with both HLS and DASH

Go to Documentation

Feature: Notifications

Product Area: CMS API

Date: 18-February-2022

Description: Two new fields - action and updated_by - added to notifications to indicate the kind of action that was taken and who performed it (if that information is available).

Go to Documentation

Feature: Generic stream concurrency

Product Area: Playback Restrictions

Date: 28-January-2022

Description: Playback will now terminate if the player is unable to contact the server to verify concurrency limits

Go to Documentation

Feature: Text tracks and auto captions

Product Area: Dynamic Ingest API

Date: 28-January-2022

Description: You can now set the status of ingested text tracks or auto captions to "published" or "draft"

Go to Documentation

Feature: Android SDK Release 6.18.1

Product Area: Native SDK for Android

Date: 28-January-2022

Description: Android SDK Release 6.18.1

Go to Documentation

Feature: Generic Stream Concurrency

Product Area: Playback Restrictions

Date: 14-January-2022

Description: Added player configuration properties to control how often and how many times the player retries contacting the server to check concurrency limits.

Go to Documentation

Feature: Import Closed Captions

Product Area: Cloud Playout

Date: 7-January-2022

Description: Importing 608/708 closed captions into Cloud Playout Channels

Go to Documentation

Feature: Searching for Channels using the Channels API

Product Area: Cloud Playout

Date: 7-January-2022

Description: Search for Cloud Playout channels with advanced filtering

Go to Documentation

Feature: Search for Channels

Product Area: Cloud Playout Channels API

Date: 7-January-2022

Description: Search for Cloud Playout channels with advanced filtering

Go to Documentation

Live

Feature: Playback token / ad_config_id

Product Area: Redundant Groups

Date: 18-March-2022

Description: New operation to create playback token for redundant groups

Go to Documentation

Feature: Playback Restrictions with Live events using Studio

Product Area: Playback Restrictions

Date: 18-February-2022

Description: In this topic, you will learn how to use Video Cloud Studio to create a Live Event with Playback Restrictions.

Go to Documentation

Feature: ad_configuration_compensation_disable

Product Area: Live API - SSAI

Date: 18-February-2022

Description: New setting will over ride ad timing compensation, a setting that reduces timing drift when ads that get returned are longer than expected. This is normally achieved by shortening the next ad break. When set to true, all ad break durations will be called as-is, and compensation will not happen.

Go to Documentation

Beacon

Date: 4-March-2022

Description: Configure one or more AWS S3 buckets to use as a destination for Cloud Playout channels

Go to Documentation

Feature: Live redundancy

Date: 4-March-2022

Description: Use Live Redundancy using Studio

Go to Documentation

Feature: Beacon Plugins Introduction

Product Area: OTT Plugins

Date: 25-February-2022

Description: In this topic, you will learn about Beacon plugins; what they are, why you would use them, and an introduction to how to implement them. This is the first of ten documents on Beacon Plugins.

Go to Documentation

Feature: Protecting Beacon app content with Forensic Watermarking

Product Area: Forensic Watermarking

Date: 4-February-2022

Description: In this topic, you will learn how to implement Forensic Watermarking with Beacon apps.

Go to Documentation

SSAI

Feature: Performance analytics for SSAI

Product Area: Analytics

Date: 25-February-2022

Description: In this topic, you will learn how to use the Analytics module to monitor the performance of your videos enabled for Server-Side Ad Insertion (SSAI).
